mapper.select: select * from tbl_blogs order by bl_date desc, bl_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_blogs( BL_SEQ, BL_USER, BL_DATE, BL_TIME, BL_TITLE, BL_CONTENTS ) values ( seq_blog.NEXTVAL, #{bl_user}, #{bl_date}, #{bl_time}, #{bl_title}, #{bl_contents} )
mapper.update: update tbl_blog SET bl_user = #{bl_user}, bl_date = #{bl_date}, bl_time = #{bl_time}, bl_title = #{bl_title}, bl_contents = #{bl_contents} where bl_seq = #{bl_seq}
